snippet: Marion (Suge) Knight, the former chief executive of Death Row Records, was taken by ambulance Thursday from a Los Angeles courthouse for stomach problems.
abstract: Marion Knight is taken by ambulance from a Los Angeles courthouse, citing stomach problems; is second such incident since the former Death Row Records executive was arrested on murder and robbery charges.
lead_paragraph: Marion (Suge) Knight, the former chief executive of Death Row Records, was taken by ambulance Thursday from a Los Angeles courthouse for stomach problems.

headline.main: California: Rap Mogul Suge Knight Falls Ill Again
headline.print_headline: California: Rap Mogul Falls Ill Again
